name: SeedSim
description:
Seed life simulator! During the game, you need to efficiently manage resources (minerals, water and life energy) in the process of plant growth. Make sure that the seed does not die, but turns into a juicy fruit!

Use WASD & mouse wheel to control the camera. 

Game made for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023".

It's my first Unity project and first game jam! I've learned a lot and I'm not going to stop :)

I hope you will enjoy!
